message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm thinking $145 is a fair price for this product. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm thinking $147.50 is a fair price for this product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $145 for the product.
